forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.
